name: Real Studio Menu File
summary: Menu file created by Xojo, a software development IDE ; contains a menu bar for a desktop application that is being developed in the Xojo IDE; used to export a menu bar from one project to another; includes information describing the menu bar, such as menus, items, IDs, behaviors, platform-specific shortcuts, and appearance; replaced by the .XOJO_BINARY_MENU , .XOJO_XML_MENU , and .XOJO_MENU file extensions.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
